name: 1.1 - Check & confirm all required permits are in place and approved.
1.2 - Check & confirm the latest drawings and specifications are being referenced.
1.3 - Check & confirm all plant and materials are available to complete the works and are fit for purpose.
1.4 - Check & confirm all required qualified labour is available to complete the work.
2.1 - Check & confirm the drawings details against the actual location.
2.2 - Install Conduit Stub-Up’s as per the locations requirements.
2.3 - Secure conduit stub-ups in position as per drawings / requirements.
2.4 - Install cables through Conduit Stub-Ups and secure / tie as required.
2.5 - Install cable ID tags on both sides of conduit stub-up as required.
2.6 - Grout seal conduit stub-ups as required.
3.1 - Verify the installation is as per the latest drawings and requirements.
Verify Documents - Specification, drawings and ITS-0119
3.2 - Complete survey of conduit stub-ups as / if required.
4.1 - Complete As Built drawings as required.
4.2 - Complete all documentation as required and hand-over as required to client.
Verify Documents - Site requirements and ITS-0119
4.3 - Check and confirm all permits have been relinquished.
Verify Documents - Site Supervision & Permit Requirement’s
FINAL ACCEPTANCE (All verifying documents completed, reviewed and accepted)
